name: Toss the Touhou
description:
Maribel wants to practice magic!!!!! Throwing Renko somehow helps!!!!!!!!!!!!! Go as far as you can!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Toss the Touhou ~ Renko in the Sky was made in 72 hours for Touhou Game Jam 7, with the theme hastily chosen as "Greenwich in the Sky", for no reason other than the name.

A parody of Toss the Turtle, which can be played here.
